attributes.action: All NHS staff to be honoured and have a national ‘Thankyou NHS day’
attributes.additional_details: These superhero’s have put their life’s in danger through the pandemic that is gripping us currently and are often disadvantaged with buying essential supplies - we the nation should formally show our love and support for each one of them
attributes.background: Once the COVID-19 pandemic has ended have an award ceremony or some form of formal recognition for all front line NHS staff (Not just a Thankyou) and have a national thank NHS day

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302613

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
